title: Multilingual Speech Synthesis
description: This model takes in English audio and outputs it towards the target language while keeping the original voice of the English audio. It turns the original English audio into text using Whisper, then converts the English text into translated text by the translate library, then uses Coqui TTS to convert the translated text into audio.

title: Grocery List App with Chatbot
description: This uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a Firebase database that allows multiple people to keep track of a grocery list in real time. In addition, direct access to a ChatGPT chatbot is available to recommend ingredients.

title: Kirby Game
description: Built a 2d-platform game based on the classic Kirby by using TypeScript along with the Kaboom.js library. The level/map was constructed using Tiled.
